title: Random leave buster, but i played the game?
body:
Let me just start off by saying I've held every color ribbon in the game and have held one consistently for the last 2.5 years, so safe to say I'm well received in my games.

I just had a game were i was on the loading screen fully loaded waiting for the game to start. It was taking ages so i alt+tabbed and noticed there was a pop up box in the background not telling me the game had crashed. So i loaded the game back up and the game was 5 mins in already, so i started playing  but my game was doing something weird so i had reset it.

5 mins later i rejoined the game so i was gone for about 5 mins again, but played out the remaining 20 mins of the match and at the end of the game i was given a warning for leaving a game. I don't understand how this could be the case when i played the game, and the reason i was 5 mins late to join was because your game crashed without telling me. I'm also a little confused as this is probably the first game I've 'left' in about 3 years of playing.

So long story short, i want to know why i received this leave buster warning and why i can't queue for 5 mins when i played the game majority of the game. The majority of the time i wasn't in the game was because your game crashed in the background without telling me and i had to restart to fix it.

A frustrated player,
Johnny

replies.body:
Your placement into a low priority queue suggests that this is not the first time that this has happened. 

However, idleness that the leaver buster system detects in ranked is treated more severely in other modes, so if it was a ranked game that this happened in, that could explain the swift punishment despite not recalling any games you have left.

You can read more about the leaver buster system [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

Thanks for taking the time to reply to me Princess.

I'm not sure whats happened, but prior to this game i was on a 7 game winning streak, so everything had been going well - Not to mention I'm not someone who 'rages' nor am i someone who would quit a game, no matter how bad it was going.

Anyway, i just wanted to come on here to vent as i don't understand how i got pinned with this when I'm not a leaver, never have been. Which i feel has been backed up by being voted as a respected player for a number of years by the community.

Well... i have 2 games left on my sentence to learn my apparent lesson but I'm heading off to bed.
However before i go i would like to apply to be released of my punishment and grated parole on good behavior - i look forward to logging in tomorrow morning to see if my request has been accepted by the high court.

Cheers,
Johnny

So i've logged in this morning to see you haven't rectified your mistake and i still have this 'waiting to queue' crap..

Its nice to know you have no intention of looking after an honest and loyal player who is being punished because your game failed to notify me it has crashed while i was waiting for the game to start.

*slow clap* well done, way to make a player who enjoys playing your game lose faith in the systems you have in place that punishes the innocent - I sure learned a lesson here..

Although you may believe the punishment was unjust, think about how those 10(?) minutes you left for made your team feel about the game, 10 minutes is a long amount of time in a game of league and can mean the difference between a win and a loss, especially these days where games can last for as little as 20-30 minutes.

I suggest you to take another look at the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more information on LPQ and the systems in place.

> **CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?**
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.

Exactly right, i do feel for my other team members as being out of the game for the first 10 mins can win or lose a game. On top of that, my 7 game winning streak also come to an end purely because the game had a popup box in the background to say the game had crashed instead of notifying me. For all i knew the game was still loading and i was simply just waiting for the match to start.

Once i got into the game the game was doing weird things so it was clear it needed a restart. so i was out of the game for 10 mins purely because the game crashed without me being notified and in turn it forced me to restart to waste even more time. I then come back to play out the remaining 32 mins.

So in short, i have done absolutely nothing wrong here, how can i be held accountable for a game failing to notify me that it had crashed while i was waiting patiently for the game to begin? Am i the only person not alt+tabbing every game on a loading screen to make sure the game is still working?

I also find it disturbing that I've been found to be a fair/fun/helpful player over the years of playing this game and none of it was taken into consideration. it was simply "clearly this player is being unsportsmen like and need to be punished."

Clearly this situation is unjust and feel it needs to be reviewed to stop it happening to other fair and honest players.

What the hell, i miss 10 mins of one 42 min game due to your game crashing in the background without notifying me and i have to wait 5 mins before i can queue for the next 5 games?

Is this a joke? 

For starters i did nothing wrong, it was your game that crashed without notifying me while i was waiting patiently for the game to begin and secondly does my good record over the last few years mean nothing?

Seriously, lift your game..
